name: nextjs-node-express-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for creating applications with nextjs/typescript for frontend and node/express on the backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup-and-start: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run start
